Here is some math: \[\lim_{n\to\infty}f_n = f\].

What is this??1

Who, me?

I hope to be a first year Statistics PhD candidate at [some university]. I am interested in high-dimensional and large-scale data problems being tackled by both statisticians and machine learners. e-mail, fork, tweet, link-in(?) me with the links below.
